definition: according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: However, I can view data in the snapshot directory if I wish.
sentences.chinese: 但是，如果我願意，我可以查看快照目錄中的數據。

sentences.english: The automated task that records data to the snapshots might not have run yet.
sentences.chinese: 將數據記錄到快照上的自動化任務可能尚未運行。

sentences.english: Designers shows us the beauty of the every-day in “snapshot”.
sentences.chinese: 設計者通過“快照”向我們展示了日常生活中的美。

sentences.english: This is the pre-transaction snapshot of this account.
sentences.chinese: 這是這個帳戶在交易之前的快照。

sentences.english: Snapshot administration is easy and quickly performable.
sentences.chinese: 快照管理十分簡單和快速。

sentences.english: With a brief nod he was off across the road, swinging his camera as he went.
sentences.chinese: 說完，他點一下頭，晃着他的快照鏡箱穿過馬路去了。

sentences.english: You can also freeze file systems to support snapshots for file system backup.
sentences.chinese: 也可以凍結文件系統來支持文件系統備份的快照。

sentences.english: You do not need to install the patch or snapshot.
sentences.chinese: 所以您不需要安裝補丁或者快照了。

sentences.english: I just posted some new snaps on my photoblog.
sentences.chinese: 我剛貼了一些新的快照在我的圖片博客上。

sentences.english: Baidu is a collection of several networks, but the snapshot is not updated.
sentences.chinese: 幾個網百度都收錄了，但快照就是不更新。

sentences.english: Baseline configuration is a snapshot of CMDB.
My new station has not changed, the old station snapshot update, but no ranking.
sentences.chinese: 我的新站沒變，老站快照更新了，但是沒排名。

sentences.english: These snapshots contain network configuration and credentials information.
sentences.chinese: 這些快照包含網絡配置和憑證信息。

sentences.english: This two-day snapshot of how the station that I have been back to June 1 of the.
sentences.chinese: 這兩天怎麼發現我的站快照都已經退回到6月1日了。

sentences.english: The snapshot retains the same permissions as the original file system.
sentences.chinese: 快照會保留與原始文件系統相同的權限。

sentences.english: Music community's preferences for various musical items.
sentences.chinese: 音樂社區對衆多音樂種類偏愛的快照。

definition: tab window (in a web browser etc)/paging/pagination/page break (computing)
